spatial_accuracy.notes: General wall alignment and room placement are high-fidelity. However, there are orientation errors with some interior doors (notably TOI-1 bathroom entry).

structural_fidelity.notes: Structural integrity is mostly preserved, but there are duplicate room labels ('BED-1' occurs twice in the 3D render, once replacing the 'BED-2' area). The duct areas lack proper architectural differentiation from internal space.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is remarkably high. Placement of the dining set, living room rug, sofa, and kitchen appliances match the plan closely.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric projection and clean geometry. Textures and lighting are soft and professional. Labeling overlap in the 3D space is the only minor visual detractor.

detected_errors.description: Room label 'BED-1' mistakenly duplicated over the BED-2 area.
TOI-1 bathroom door swing direction/orientation does not match the 2D plan precisely.
The foyer entry wall thickness appears slightly exaggerated compared to the 2D plan's line weights.
Text labels from the 2D plan are rendered as floaters in 3D, causing some visual occlusion of furniture.
